-- IPORTANT INFO : Prior to running this notebook you should update the calendar_dim_plus table, 
-- to get the most up to date informations regarding the columns which use the date 
-- To run update the table jus run the Calendar notebook 

IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
GO

-- CREATE VIEW FOR SICKNESS FACT--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness
AS


SELECT [StaffNumber],[PreviousFY],[CurrentFY],[PreviousCY],[CurrentCY]
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
date.financial_year AS MeasureYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] abs
FULL JOIN [default].[dbo].[calendar_dim_plus] date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness') and financial_year in ('CurrentFY','PreviousFY') AND IsActive = 'Y'
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,financial_year


UNION

SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID,
date.calendar_year AS MeasureYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] abs
FULL JOIN [default].[dbo].[calendar_dim_plus] date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceEndDate
WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness') and calendar_year in ('CurrentCY','PreviousCY') AND IsActive = 'Y'
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,calendar_year
) AS SourceTable
PIVOT
(
max(SicknessCount)
FOR MeasureYear IN ([PreviousFY],[CurrentFY],[PreviousCY],[CurrentCY])
) AS PivotTable
-- ORDER BY [StaffNumber]

GO
